item.title: Pakistan’s Speaker to attend Khaleda Zia’s funeral
item.description: Sardar Ayaz Sadiq, Speaker of Pakistan’s National Assembly, will represent Pakistan at the funeral of former Prime Minister and BNP Chairperson Begum Khaleda Zia on Wednesday. The announcement was confirmed by Pakistan’s Deputy Prime Minister Ishaq Dar through his verified X account.
